name: flaming/million - comics x games 2021
description:
Hello : 3 

My name is nilson, I run a tiny queer game art organization called swampbabes. I'm an archivist, glitch artist, bad poet, ROM hacker, and barista.

During Comics x Games, I'll have this bundle for flaming/million plus TONS of other weird items available for download here. Any $$$$ thrown my way will go right back into creating more weird objects ~ 

video games have been queer is a 32-page extended zine essay on my relation to queer games and all games. It's currently being presented as part of my MFA thesis at Visual Studies Workshop.

I'm also excited to revive two ancient experimental rpgs, the killers, a short nihilist narrative about JRPGs, and at the foot of a baldaquin, a puzzle game that became GraveCamp, long thought to be lost forever on a dead hard drive on the floor of my ex's pick-up truck (unfortunately PC only due to being made in VX Ace). Circa 2015.

What's included in this bundle:

  • flaming/million (experimental RPG)
  • video games have been queer (extended zine - discount price! usually $4.20)
  • at the foot of a baldaquin (very esoteric roguelite-inspired rpg)
  • the killers (short nihilist horror narrative rpg)
  • midnight mass/magic circle (super sad games essay)
  • game boy advance (digital copy of sexy riso zine)
  • ? ? ? ? (mystery folder of random files from pc)

If you're still reading this, swing by our Queer Games Bundle, too, which goes live in June 2021 < 3

Any questions or incantations, please reach out via nilsonthomascarroll @ gmail.com! I basically do all this so cool people will dm me, lol.

Thanks for stopping by, s p a c e c o w b o y

nilson
